panels.description: Shows rate of requests against /query for the given time.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests against /query.

targets.expr: sum by (job, code) (rate(http_requests_total{job=~"$job", handler="query",code=~"5.."}[$interval])) / ignoring (code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{job=~"$job", handler="query"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests in quantiles.
panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of requests against /query_range for the given time range.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests against /query_range.

targets.expr: sum by (job, code) (rate(http_requests_total{job=~"$job", handler="query_range",code=~"5.."}[$interval])) / ignoring (code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{job=~"$job", handler="query_range"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests in quantiles.
panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from other queriers.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from other queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval])) / ignoring (grpc_code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from other queriers, in quantiles.
panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Streamed gRPC requests from other queriers.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from other queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval])) / ignoring (grpc_code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from other queriers, in quantiles
panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of DNS lookups to discover stores.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of failures compared to the total number of executed DNS lookups.
panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows available capacity of processing queries in parallel.
panels.title: Concurrent Capacity
